title: MD
biography: Sonali Kulkarni is an Indian actress, producer, and writer who primarily appears in Marathi, Hindi and few Tamil films. Kulkarni is considered as one of the most accomplished and highest-paid actresses in Marathi cinema, and is a recipient of several accolades including a National Film Award, four Maharashtra State Film Awards and four Filmfare Marathi Awards. She was honoured with V. Shantaram Special Contribution Award in 2010 by the Government of Maharashtra.
aiSummary: Alok Kulkarni is a community mental health specialist with an H-index of 3 at Psychiatry (Member). Has been published in Small science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
